title: Double slash in href attribute on search results
body:
by **teabee89**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Go to http://weekly.golang.org/search?q=hello+world
2. Click on any result, for instance the first one, that is
"/doc/progs/go1.go:"

What is the expected output?
Get to the following page : http://weekly.golang.org/doc/progs/go1.go?h=hello+world

What do you see instead?
Wrong link: http://doc/progs/go1.go?h=hello+world 


Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
weekly

In the HTML here is what I find :
<a href="//doc/progs/go1.go?h=hello+world">/doc/progs/go1.go</a>
